hadiths.text: Abu Umamah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "There are three whose Salat would not rise up beyond their ears: The runaway slave until he returns, a woman who spends a night while her husband is angry with her, and a people's Imam whom they dislike

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ أَمَّ قَوْمًا وَهُمْ لَهُ كَارِهُونَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related [About] Whoever Leads People (In Salat) While They Dislike Him
